name: cxpne0d
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl3anc(w0, wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0), wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc)), wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))
-| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc)), wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wne(c0, nat0), wcel(c1, cc)), wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wne(co(c0, ccxp, c1), nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cc))
-| wi(w0, wne(c0, nat0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cc))

comment: Complex exponentiation is nonzero if its mantissa is nonzero. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
